comment: This old man believes himself as a outstanding teacher of the year! Apparently all his course materials and knowledge are gathered from Grover Power system books. He shares laughs with americans only! Roll eyes to graduate students, as if they're asking for his kidneys

This guy is teaching at Texas State University now. Get annoyed if asking questions, so be prepare to know everything if you take his class. Took 13 Homeworks, 3 Quizes, 2 Mid term exams and an final Exam! grades partially, if your answer doesn't match exactly with his books. doesn't give a damn whether you're trying.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lots of homework--So many papers

comment: Very bad grading. Doesn't care if you can survive 20 homeworks. Out of syllabus questions! Apparently his favourite students are all white americans
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment:
He's not in KSU any more. He's taking classes at Texas State University. Apparently, he thinks you as you already know everything. Asking questions annoy him a lot. He's a Singaporean but don't like international students in his class ! LOL

Gives homework every week, take extensive quizzes and exams. RUN
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: Diong is very.. proper? He is very structured in what he does, and because of that he might seem a little dull. BUT he is extremely caring and will help students anyway he can. He is an average teacher, extremely intelligent, and A+ individual. I fully recommend Dr. Diong without reservation! He is a good person to know and be involved with.
Nothing outstanding, nothing terrible either. He is more interested in research aspects of his job for sure though as opposed to teaching.

This prof was not the best for me. I found his teaching style to be very boring and lacking inspiring behavior. As some have already said it felt like a waste to go to class because he used bad ppt's from a different prof that basically came straight form the book. Its a shame to pay as much money as students do for this type of work. he is ok guy

The class felt hard and boring, but the material could have been more inspiring. I also felt dumb asking some questions because the prof had a innate (but no on purpose) ability to make u feel dumb because he is very intelligent haha and "professional". not good at teaching, uses bad slides from another prof instead of making his own then complains

Billy Diong is an okay professor. I would say he is not very good at teaching, but very smart (such as the case with most engineering prof). I could have passed this class never showing up to class and memorizing the HW problems. I think the course material beneficial, however prof has a tendency to have dry and monotone lectures. Boring, but good.

Dr. Diong is very nice and will help you if you need it. If you are struggling in his class hang in there because he will most likely help you out. He posts all the notes online and reads straight from them in class. Almost a waste of time to go to class. Not my favorite professor, but he is a nice guy and cares.

He's a very nice guy but one of those teachers that is so smart that can't understand why you don't understand the materials. I survived his class by teaching myself. He lets you use a cheat sheet but it won't help you cuz the concepts are too complicated than just needing a reminder. Disappointed I had to take him for circuits

Good professor. He has a great passion for his career and tries his best to encourage you study hard and learn the stuffs you need to know to be a good engineer. He's also very organized and dedicated.

Great Professor. Dr. Diong is one of the best professor I've ever had. He covers all the materials very well. He's extremely helpful and fair at grading. He really loves his job and helps the students out as much as he can.  He feels responsible for every EE student graduating from Southern Poly. That's why his exams are REASONABLY hard.
His class is hard, he skips a lot and test is not about what he tech  in the class, test is very very hard

Great guy.  Great Teacher.  He follows his slides and makes sure you understand everything.  If you don't he will do everything he can to try and help you out.  Very very hard tests but he averages nicely. Great Material and Teaching Ability.
